plays.text: Penalty to Ken Klee 2 minutes for Hooking Mats Sundin
Goal scored by Darcy Tucker assisted by Shayne Corson and Travis Green
Penalty to Bryan McCabe 2 minutes for Interference Jeff Halpern
Goal scored by Darcy Tucker assisted by Bryan McCabe and Travis Green
Penalty to Jason Doig 2 minutes for Clipping Ric Jackman
Goal scored by Dainius Zubrus assisted by Robert Lang and Brendan Witt
Penalty to Calle Johansson 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Nikolai Antropov
Penalty to Jeff Halpern 2 minutes for Interference Robert Reichel
Penalty to Jaromir Jagr 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Tie Domi
Penalty to Tie Domi 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Jason Doig 2 minutes for Tripping Darcy Tucker
Penalty to Travis Green 2 minutes for Interference Mike Grier
Goal scored by Bryan McCabe assisted by Mikael Renberg and Mats Sundin
Penalty to Jyrki Lumme 2 minutes for Holding Jeff Halpern
Goal scored by Mats Sundin unassisted
